name: Brave Rabbit
description:
'Brave Rabbit' is a very difficult action-puzzle game.
Can you figure it all out?

Challenge various puzzles in the world made of cube block tiles!
Get new characters through play!
Study efficient routes and achieve the best record!

Features:
  • Voxel-based full 3d graphic
  • The proper combination of classic puzzle and action
  • Various puzzles with high difficulty
  • Various characters with different abilities
  • Compete your clear time with other players
  • Continuous content updates

Leave your feedbacks in the comments section below. Much appreciated!
